user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable, reliable underwear that would provide all-day wearability without discomfort or visible lines.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable everyday essentials that would feel soft against my skin and provide reliable coverage. The product's description highlighted its durability and comfort, which were key factors in my decision. I appreciated the tag-free design and the fact that it would retain its quality after multiple washes.

I needed a comfortable option that would not create any visible lines under my clothing. The emphasis on a flat waistband and full coverage appealed to me, as I wanted something that would fit well and move with me throughout the day. The positive reviews from others also reinforced my decision.

I was seeking a soft and comfortable option for daily wear. The product's promise of all-day comfort and a plush-backed waistband caught my attention. My initial skepticism was overcome by the positive feedback from other customers, which made me feel more confident in my choice.

I wanted a high-waist style that would provide comfort and breathability. The moisture-wicking material and soft waistband were appealing features that addressed my need for comfort throughout the day. The positive reviews about the price and comfort also influenced my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, soft, and provide a good fit. I value items that maintain their quality over time, such as clothing that retains its shape and feel after multiple washes. I appreciate features like tag-free designs, breathable materials, and thoughtful construction that enhances comfort, such as plush waistbands and stretchable fabrics. Additionally, I tend to favor products that offer good value for money, especially when they are durable and reliable for everyday use. Overall, I look for items that combine practicality with comfort, making them suitable for both casual and active wear.

conversation.content: I want comfortable, reliable underwear for all-day wear without discomfort or visible lines. within my expected price range: [12.96, 15.97]
What specific size or style of underwear do you prefer for all-day wear?
I prefer high-waisted underwear that provides comfort and breathability throughout the day. Moisture-wicking materials and a soft waistband are features that I find appealing.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Hi-Cut> / Item ID: B08YXC41MD / Price: $8.66 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® hi-cut panty is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-cut, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic high-rise design, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Wacoal Women's B-Smooth High-Cut Panty> / Item ID: B01N0P3VW2 / Price: $13.25 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Knitted-in cotton crotch. Seamless high-cut brief with ribbed waistband'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear> / Item ID: B08YFLPPDM / Price: $14.18 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features the ultra soft waistband that won't pinch or bind. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Made from ultra soft, breathable ring-spun cotton these panties will keep you feeling fresh all day with Cool Comfort wicking technology. These panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Hipster Underwear."]
